body:
Guys, so I got a new  youtube channel and I need your help to promote it :D

The channel is based on Gaming and Reviewing with aspects of Gaming and Comics and a few classic titles of games like, FIFA, Minecraft, Terraria (PS3), Minecraft (PS3), I also do some fun challenges just for a bit of a laugh. so if you could say below some other content of gaming that you'd like to see, just post a comment and if I feel like it is worth my time then I may reply to it.Last thing I need to say is if your a fan of comics - and some relate to TV shows - then I will try my best to upload regularly.Spread this around to all your friends. There will be some links below.
                                                                                 V


Youtube : https://m.youtube.com/channel/UC3MhessXltQfK4prKEtPz4A 
 
Twitch :  twitch.tv/liveminingmasters

replies.body:
Er, a good tip of mine would be to create a custom URL, for example:
https://www.youtube.com/user/MLGPorky

replies.body:
I've tried doing that and I looked up tutorials on how to. I can see where they're clicking and stuff but the same stuff doesn't appear on my screen. Can you skype later and teach me? :D

<<#3<##3<<3#
